# intro

## setup enviroment
```{r setup}
# set directory for chunks
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file())

# install packages
library(data.table)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)

# set dir
project_dir <- rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file()
data_dir <- paste(project_dir, "/data", sep = "")
```

# preparing the data
## data sources
### import data
```{r db connect}
# connect to server
con <- RPostgreSQL::dbConnect(PostgreSQL(),
                              dbname = "main",
                              host = "localhost",
                              port = 5433)

table_names <- RPostgreSQL::dbListTables(con)
query <- 'SElECT * FROM "dailyActivity"'
daily_activity <- RPostgreSQL::dbGetQuery(con, query)

print(glimpse(daily_activity))
RPostgreSQL::dbDisconnect(con)
```
